effect_entries.effect:
Used by trainer in the Galactic Eterna Building, on the ground floor, to the left of the TV
:   Unlocks the secret []{pokemon:rotom} room, in which there are five appliances which can change Rotom's form.
effect_entries.short_effect: Gen IV: The key to Rotom's appliance room. Gen III: The key to Cinnabar Gym.

flavor_text_entries.text:
決まった　場所で　使うことで
特殊な　電気信号を　だして
扉を　開ける　ハイテクな　カギ。

A high-tech key that has to be used at
a specific location. It emits a special
electronic signal to open a door.

Una sofisticata chiave da usare in un determinato
luogo. Emette un impulso elettrico speciale che
apre una porta.
Bonguri de color azul y aroma tierno.

Ein besonderer Schlüssel, der an einem speziellen
Ort Türen durch ein elektrisches Signal öffnet.

Une clé destinée à une serrure très complexe.
Ouvre une porte en transmettant un signal
électrique.

정해진 장소에서 쓰는 것으로
특수한 전기 신호를 내어
문을 여는 첨단기술의 열쇠.

きまった　ばしょで　つかうことで
とくしゅな　でんきしんごうを　だして
とびらを　あける　ハイテクな　カギ。

A high-tech key that has to be used at
a specific location. It emits a special
electric signal to open a door.

A high-tech key that has to be used at
a specific location. It emits a special
electric signal to open a door.

Clé destinée à une serrure très
complexe. Ouvre une porte en
transmettant un signal électrique.

A high-tech key that has to be used at
a specific location. It emits a special
electric signal to open a door.

A high-tech key that has to be used at
a specific location. It emits a special
electric signal to open a door.

The key to CINNABAR ISLAND GYM’s
front door. It is colored red and
decorated.

The key to the
CINNABAR ISLAND
GYM’s entrance.
